name: Nightpack Ambusher
original_text:
Flash
Other Wolves and Werewolves you control get +1/+1.
At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't cast a spell this turn, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

rulings.text: A creature that’s both a Wolf and a Werewolf gets only +1/+1 from Nightpack Ambusher’s ability.

Because damage remains marked on a creature until it’s removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to other Wolves and Werewolves you control may become lethal if Nightpack Ambusher leaves the battlefield during that turn.

Nightpack Ambusher looks at the entire turn to see if you have cast a spell, even if Nightpack Ambusher wasn’t on the battlefield when that spell was cast. Notably, you won’t get a Wolf token during your end step if you cast Nightpack Ambusher during your turn.
If you cast a spell that was countered, Nightpack Ambusher’s last ability doesn’t trigger.

name: Crafty Cutpurse
original_text:
Flash
When Crafty Cutpurse enters the battlefield, each token that would be created under an opponent's control this turn is created under your control instead.

rulings.text: Crafty Cutpurse’s replacement effect is applied before any other replacement effects that would also modify how the token enters the battlefield. For example, if an opponent controls Anointed Procession, your Crafty Cutpurse’s effect applies before that of Anointed Procession and you won’t get twice as many tokens.
Crafty Cutpurse won’t retroactively change the control of tokens that have already entered the battlefield.

If a token would be created tapped and attacking, but the token’s controller isn’t an attacking player, that token is created tapped but not attacking. If a token would be created blocking a creature, but the token’s controller isn’t a defending player, that token is created but isn’t blocking.

If the effect that creates the token also creates a delayed triggered ability, Crafty Cutpurse doesn’t change who controls that ability. For example, if your opponent activates the ability of Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker, that opponent controls the delayed triggered ability. When the ability triggers, that player can’t sacrifice the token, so it remains on the battlefield.

On the other hand, if the effect that creates the token grants a triggered ability to the token, the player who controls the token at the time the ability triggers will be the player who controls that ability. For example, if your opponent activates the second ability of Jace, Cunning Castaway, the token has the ability. If the ability triggers, you’ll control it, so you’ll have to sacrifice the token.

If two or more players each have resolved Crafty Cutpurse’s triggered ability and a token would be created, the token’s would-be controller chooses one of the applicable Crafty Cutpurse effects to apply. Then the new would-be controller of the token repeats this process among the remaining Crafty Cutpurse effects, and so on, until there are no more possible such effects to apply. Each effect can be applied to the token only once this way.

The above procedure means that if each player in a two-player game has resolved Crafty Cutpurse’s triggered ability and one would create a token, it really will enter the battlefield under that player’s control. The token would enter the battlefield under player A’s control, so player B’s effect affects it. Now that token would enter the battlefield under player B’s control, so player A’s effect affects it. Each replacement effect has now been used, so the token will enter the battlefield under player A’s control.

foreign_names.text: Distruggi una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio di colore verde o bianco. Guadagni 1 punto vita.

foreign_names.flavor:
「この沼は、肩書とか財産とか信仰とか、そういったものにケチを付けたりしません。単に空腹なんです。」
――辺境林の案内人、バイアーラス
foreign_names.name: 害悪な掌握
foreign_names.text: 緑か白の、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。あなたは１点のライフを得る。

foreign_names.flavor:
"늪지는 당신의 지위나 부, 신실함에는 콧방귀도 뀌지 않습니다. 그건 그냥 배가 고플 뿐이에요."
—오지 안내인, 바이아라스
foreign_names.name: 사악한 움켜쥠
foreign_names.text: 녹색 또는 백색인 생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 파괴한다. 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.

foreign_names.flavor:
"O pântano está se bolhando para o seu título, a sua riqueza ou a sua devoção. Ele só tem fome."
— Byaras, guia da mata
foreign_names.name: Garras Nóxias
foreign_names.text: Destrua a criatura ou o planeswalker alvo que seja verde ou branco. Você ganha 1 ponto de vida.

foreign_names.flavor:
«Болоту твои титулы, богатства и набожность до вонючего пузыря. Оно просто голодное».
— Бьярес, лесной проводник
foreign_names.name: Заразная Хватка
foreign_names.text: Уничтожьте целевое зеленое или белое существо или planeswalker-а. Вы получаете 1 жизнь.

foreign_names.flavor:
「无论你是达官显贵、万贯财主还是虔诚信徒，对于这片腐沼都没有区别。它就是饿了。」
～蛮荒林向导拜亚斯
foreign_names.name: 恶毒缠身
foreign_names.text: 消灭目标绿色或白色的生物或鹏洛客。你获得1点生命。

foreign_names.flavor:
「無論你是達官顯貴、萬貫財主還是虔誠信徒，對於這片腐沼都沒有區別。它就是餓了。」
～蠻荒林嚮導拜亞斯
foreign_names.name: 惡毒纏身
foreign_names.text: 消滅目標綠色或白色的生物或鵬洛客。你獲得1點生命。

name: Noxious Grasp
original_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker that's green or white. You gain 1 life.

rulings.text: If the target creature or planeswalker is an illegal target by the time Noxious Grasp tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain life. If the target is legal but not destroyed (most likely because it has indestructible), you will gain life.

text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker that's green or white. You gain 1 life.

flavor:
"The hero with the magic sword slays the dragon? Not this time."
—Nicol Bolas

foreign_names.flavor:
„Der Held mit dem Zauberschwert besiegt den Drachen? Diesmal nicht."
—Nicol Bolas

—Nicol Bolas

foreign_names.text:

foreign_names.flavor:
« Un héros armé d'une épée magique pourfend le dragon ? Pas cette fois. »
—Nicol Bolas

foreign_names.flavor:
"L'eroe con la spada magica sconfigge il drago? Stavolta no."
—Nicol Bolas

foreign_names.text:

foreign_names.flavor:
「魔法の剣を持った英雄がドラゴンを倒すというわけか？そんなことは起きぬ。」

foreign_names.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。

• クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。

foreign_names.flavor:
"마법의 검을 가진 영웅이 용을 처치한다고? 이번에는 아니지."
—니콜 볼라스
foreign_names.name: 폭군의 멸시
foreign_names.text:
하나를 선택한다 —

• 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreign_names.flavor:
"O herói com a espada mágica mata o dragão? Não desta vez."
— Nicol Bolas

foreign_names.text:
Escolha um —

foreign_names.flavor:
«Герой с волшебным мечом убивает дракона? Не в этот раз».
— Никол Болас

foreign_names.flavor:
「英雄手持魔剑击杀巨龙？这次可不会这样。」

foreign_names.flavor:

flavor: Dependence on luck is anathema to Kefnet's rigorous studies. Those who hope to escape his maze by chance never succeed.

foreign_names.flavor: Einfach auf Glück zu setzen, wäre eine Beleidigung von Kefnets Intellekt. Wer ihm entkommen will, muss seinen Verstand benutzen.

foreign_names.text: Neutralisiere einen Kreaturenzauber deiner Wahl.

foreign_names.flavor: Depender del azar es un ultraje a los rigurosos estudios de Kefnet. Quienes tengan la esperanza de escapar por suerte de su laberinto jamás lo lograrán.

foreign_names.text: Contrarresta el hechizo de criatura objetivo.

foreign_names.flavor: Compter sur la chance est contraire à la rigueur des études de Kefnet. Ceux qui espèrent qu'elle leur permettra de sortir de son labyrinthe n'y parviennent jamais.

foreign_names.text: Contrecarrez le sort de créature ciblé.

foreign_names.text:
疾病の神殿はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
疾病の神殿が戦場に出たとき、占術１を行う。
{T}：{B}か{G}を加える。

foreign_names.name: 병폐의 신전
foreign_names.text:
병폐의 신전은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
병폐의 신전이 전장에 들어올 때, 점술 1을 한다.
{T}: {B} 또는 {G}를 추가한다.

foreign_names.name: Templo da Enfermidade
foreign_names.text:
Templo da Enfermidade entra no campo de batalha virado.
Quando Templo da Enfermidade entrar no campo de batalha, use vidência 1.
{T}: Adicione {B} ou {G}.

foreign_names.name: Храм Болезни
foreign_names.text:
Храм Болезни выходит на поле битвы повернутым.
Когда Храм Болезни выходит на поле битвы, предскажите 1.
{T}: добавьте {B} или {G}.

foreign_names.name: 疫病殿堂
foreign_names.text:
疫病殿堂须横置进战场。
当疫病殿堂进战场时，占卜1。
{T}：加{B}或{G}。

foreign_names.name: 疫病殿堂
foreign_names.text:
疫病殿堂須橫置進戰場。
當疫病殿堂進戰場時，占卜1。
{T}：加{B}或{G}。

name: Temple of Malady
original_text:
Temple of Malady enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Malady enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
text:
Temple of Malady enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Malady enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

flavor: None can tell how many vessels are tangled up on the sea floor—or how much treasure remains unclaimed.

foreign_names.flavor: Niemand weiß, wie viele Schiffswracks auf dem Meeresgrund liegen — oder wie viele Schätze darin noch ungehoben sind.
foreign_names.name: Versunkene Katakomben
foreign_names.text:
Die Versunkenen Katakomben kommen getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst eine Insel oder einen Sumpf.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {U} oder {B}.

foreign_names.flavor: Nadie puede saber cuántos barcos hundidos hay en el fondo del mar ni cuántos tesoros siguen sin ser encontrados.
foreign_names.name: Catacumba inundada
foreign_names.text:
La Catacumba inundada entra al campo de batalla girada a menos que controles una Isla o un Pantano.
{T}: Agrega {U} o {B} a tu reserva de maná.

foreign_names.flavor: Nul ne sait combien de navires reposent au fond de l'océan, ni combien de trésors sont encore engloutis.
foreign_names.name: Catacombes noyées
foreign_names.text:
Les Catacombes noyées arrivent sur le champ de bataille engagées à moins que vous ne contrôliez une île ou un marais.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {B} à votre réserve.

foreign_names.flavor: Nessuno può dire quanti vascelli giacciano accatastati sul fondo del mare, né quanti tesori restino da rivendicare.
foreign_names.name: Catacombe Allagate
foreign_names.text:
Le Catacombe Allagate entrano nel campo di battaglia TAPpate a meno che tu non controlli un'Isola o una Palude.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o {B} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreign_names.flavor: どれほど多くの船体が海底に眠るのか、誰にもわからない。それはつまり、どれほどの宝物が手つかずで眠っているのか、である。
foreign_names.name: 水没した地下墓地
foreign_names.text:
あなたが島か沼をコントロールしていないかぎり、水没した地下墓地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{U}か{B}を加える。

foreign_names.flavor: 얼마나 많은 배들이 바다 밑에 얽혀 있는지, 얼마나 많은 보물이 주인을 기다리고 있는지 아무도 알 수 없다.
foreign_names.name: 수몰된 묘지
foreign_names.text:
수몰된 묘지는 당신이 섬이나 늪을 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {U} 또는 {B}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.

foreign_names.flavor: Ninguém sabe dizer quantas embarcações estão presas no fundo do mar — nem quantos tesouros permanecem intocados.
foreign_names.name: Catacumba Submersa
foreign_names.text:
Catacumba Submersa entra no campo de batalha virada, a menos que você controle uma Ilha ou um Pântano.
{T}: Adicione {U} ou {B} à sua reserva de mana.

foreign_names.flavor: Никому не известно, сколько кораблей покоится на морском дне, и сколько кладов еще ждет своего хозяина.
foreign_names.name: Затопленная Катакомба
foreign_names.text:
Затопленная Катакомба выходит на поле битвы повернутой, если только под вашим контролем нет Острова или Болота.
{T}: добавьте {U} или {B} в ваше хранилище маны.

foreign_names.flavor: 没人知道有多少船只层叠沉在海底，也没人知道究竟有多少无主的宝藏。
foreign_names.name: 水没墓穴
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控海岛或沼泽，否则水没墓穴须横置进战场。
{T}：加{U}或{B}到你的法术力池中。

foreign_names.flavor: 沒人知道有多少船隻層疊沉在海底，也沒人知道究竟有多少無主的寶藏。
foreign_names.name: 水沒墓穴
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控海島或沼澤，否則水沒墓穴須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{U}或{B}到你的魔法力池中。

name: Drowned Catacomb
original_text:
Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

rulings.text: This checks for lands you control with the land type Island or Swamp, not for lands named Island or Swamp. The lands it checks for don’t have to be basic lands. For example, if you control Blood Crypt (a nonbasic land with the land types Swamp and Mountain), Drowned Catacomb will enter the battlefield untapped.
As this is entering the battlefield, it checks for lands that are already on the battlefield. It won’t see lands that are entering the battlefield at the same time (due to Warp World, for example).

text:
Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

flavor:
"Shut the gates. In the Underrealm we will outlast the coming doom."
—Vraska
name: Golgari Guildgate
original_text:
Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
text:
Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

flavor:
"They never found the body of young Josu, or that of his murderous sister."
—"The Fall of the House of Vess"

foreign_names.flavor: „Der Körper des jungen Josu wurde nie gefunden … und auch seine Schwester, die Mörderin, bleibt verschollen." —„Der Untergang des Hauses Vess"
foreign_names.name: Waldfriedhof
foreign_names.text:
Der Waldfriedhof kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst einen Sumpf oder einen Wald.
{T}: Erzeuge {B} oder {G}.

foreign_names.flavor: "Nunca encontraron el cuerpo del joven Josu ni el de su hermana fratricida". —"La caída de la casa Vess"
foreign_names.name: Cementerio boscoso
foreign_names.text:
El Cementerio boscoso entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que controles un Pantano o un Bosque.
{T}: Agrega {B} o {G}.

foreign_names.flavor: « Le corps du jeune Josu ne fut jamais retrouvé, et celui de sa meurtrière de sœur non plus. » —« La chute de la Maison Vess »
foreign_names.name: Cimetière des sylves
foreign_names.text:
Le Cimetière des sylves arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé à moins que vous ne contrôliez un marais ou une forêt.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {G}.

foreign_names.flavor: "Il corpo del giovane Josu non venne mai ritrovato, né quello della sorella omicida." —"La Caduta della Casa dei Vess"
foreign_names.name: Cimitero Silvestre
foreign_names.text:
Il Cimitero Silvestre entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato a meno che tu non controlli una Palude o una Foresta.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o {G}.

foreign_names.flavor: 「結局、若きジョスの死体は見つからなかった。人殺しの妹もだ。」 ――「ヴェス家の没落」
foreign_names.name: 森林の墓地
foreign_names.text:
森林の墓地は、あなたが沼か森をコントロールしていないかぎり、タップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{B}か{G}を加える。

foreign_names.flavor: "그들은 어린 조수의 시체도, 살인귀 누이의 시체도 찾지 못했다." —"베스 가문의 몰락"
foreign_names.name: 삼림 묘지
foreign_names.text:
삼림 묘지는 당신이 늪이나 숲을 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {B} 또는 {G}를 추가한다.

foreign_names.flavor: "Jamais se achou o corpo do jovem Josu, nem o de sua irmã homicida." — "A Queda da Casa de Vess"
foreign_names.name: Cemitério da Floresta
foreign_names.text:
Cemitério da Floresta entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você controle um Pântano ou uma Floresta.
{T}: Adicione {B} ou {G}.

foreign_names.flavor: «Никто так и не нашел тел — ни юного Джозу, ни его душегубки-сестры». — «Падение дома Весс»
foreign_names.name: Лесное Кладбище
foreign_names.text:
Лесное Кладбище выходит на поле битвы повернутым, если под вашим контролем нет Болота или Леса.
{T}: добавьте {B} или {G}.

foreign_names.flavor: 「他们从未找到英年霍苏的遗体，也未曾发现那位害命妹妹的踪迹。」 ～「维斯家族衰亡记」
foreign_names.name: 林地墓园
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控沼泽或树林，否则林地墓园须横置进战场。
{T}：加{B}或{G}。

foreign_names.flavor: 「他們從未找到英年霍蘇的遺體，也未曾發現那位害命妹妹的蹤跡。」 ～「維斯家族衰亡記」
foreign_names.name: 林地墓園
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控沼澤或樹林，否則林地墓園須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{B}或{G}。

name: Woodland Cemetery
original_text:
Woodland Cemetery enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
text:
Woodland Cemetery enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

name: Watery Grave
original_text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Watery Grave enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

flavor: Few believe Duskmantle exists. Fewer find it. None live to bear witness.

foreign_names.flavor: Nur wenige glauben, dass die Dämmerhülle existiert. Noch weniger finden sie. Niemand lebt lange genug, um von ihr zu berichten.
foreign_names.name: Nasses Grab
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {U} oder {B}.)
Sowie das Nasse Grab ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kommt es getappt ins Spiel.

foreign_names.flavor: Pocos creen en la existencia de Mantoscuro. Menos aún lo encuentran. Ninguno vive para ser testigo.
foreign_names.name: Tumba inundada
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Agrega {U} o {B}.)
En cuanto la Tumba inundada entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si no lo haces, entra al campo de batalla girada.

foreign_names.flavor: Rares sont ceux qui croient à l'existence de Manteaubrune. Ceux qui y accèdent sont encore moins nombreux. Aucun ne vit pour en témoigner.
foreign_names.name: Tombe aquatique
foreign_names.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {B}.)
Au moment où la Tombe aquatique arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous ne le faites pas, elle arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.

foreign_names.flavor: In pochi credono nell'esistenza di Mantoscuro. Sono ancora meno coloro che la trovano. Nessuno sopravvive per raccontarlo.
foreign_names.name: Tomba d'Acqua
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {U} o {B}.)
Mentre la Tomba d'Acqua entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se non lo fai, entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.

foreign_names.flavor: ダスクマントルの存在を信じる者は少ない。それを見た者はもっと少ない。それを証言する生存者はいない。
foreign_names.name: 湿った墓
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：{U}か{B}を加える。）
湿った墓が戦場に出るに際し、あなたは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。そうしないなら、これはタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreign_names.flavor: 아주 소수만이 더스크맨틀이 존재한다고 믿는다. 더 적은 수만이 더스크맨틀을 발견한다. 아무도 살아남아서 이를 증언할 수 없다.
foreign_names.name: 수몰된 무덤
foreign_names.text:
({T}: {U} 또는 {B}를 추가한다.)
수몰된 무덤이 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 생명 2점을 지불할 수 있다. 그러지 않으면, 수몰된 무덤은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

foreign_names.flavor: Poucos creem que o Manto do Crepúsculo exista. Pouquíssimos o encontram. Ninguém vive para contar.
foreign_names.name: Túmulo Aquático
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Adicione {U} ou {B}.)
Conforme Túmulo Aquático entra no campo de batalha, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se não fizer isso, ele entrará no campo de batalha virado.

foreign_names.flavor: Немногие верят в существование Мантии Сумрака. Еще меньше тех, кто ее находил. И никого не осталось в живых, чтобы рассказать об этом.
foreign_names.name: Водная Могила
foreign_names.text:
({T}: добавьте {U} или {B}.)
При выходе Водной Могилы на поле битвы вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы этого не делаете, она выходит на поле битвы повернутой.

foreign_names.flavor: 没什么人相信暮篷存在。亲眼见到者更少。而见到后还能报信的，则一个都没有。
foreign_names.name: 积水墓地
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{U}或{B}。）
于积水墓地进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则积水墓地须横置进战场。

foreign_names.flavor: 沒什麼人相信暮篷存在。親眼見到者更少。而見到後還能報信的，則一個都沒有。
foreign_names.name: 積水墓地
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{U}或{B}。）
於積水墓地進戰場時，你可以支付2點生命。如果你未如此作，則積水墓地須橫置進戰場。

En cuanto la Tumba inundada entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si no lo haces, entra al campo de batalla girada.

foreign_names.flavor: Rares sont ceux qui croient à l'existence de Manteaubrune. Ceux qui y accèdent sont encore moins nombreux. Aucun ne vit pour en témoigner.
foreign_names.name: Tombe aquatique
foreign_names.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {B}.)
Au moment où la Tombe aquatique arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous ne le faites pas, elle arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.

foreign_names.flavor: In pochi credono nell'esistenza di Mantoscuro. Sono ancora meno coloro che la trovano. Nessuno sopravvive per raccontarlo.
foreign_names.name: Tomba d'Acqua
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {U} o {B}.)
Mentre la Tomba d'Acqua entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se non lo fai, entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.

foreign_names.flavor: ダスクマントルの存在を信じる者は少ない。それを見た者はもっと少ない。それを証言する生存者はいない。
foreign_names.name: 湿った墓
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：{U}か{B}を加える。）
湿った墓が戦場に出るに際し、あなたは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。そうしないなら、これはタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreign_names.flavor: 아주 소수만이 더스크맨틀이 존재한다고 믿는다. 더 적은 수만이 더스크맨틀을 발견한다. 아무도 살아남아서 이를 증언할 수 없다.
foreign_names.name: 수몰된 무덤
foreign_names.text:
({T}: {U} 또는 {B}를 추가한다.)
수몰된 무덤이 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 생명 2점을 지불할 수 있다. 그러지 않으면, 수몰된 무덤은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

foreign_names.flavor: Poucos creem que o Manto do Crepúsculo exista. Pouquíssimos o encontram. Ninguém vive para contar.
foreign_names.name: Túmulo Aquático
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Adicione {U} ou {B}.)
Conforme Túmulo Aquático entra no campo de batalha, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se não fizer isso, ele entrará no campo de batalha virado.

foreign_names.flavor: Немногие верят в существование Мантии Сумрака. Еще меньше тех, кто ее находил. И никого не осталось в живых, чтобы рассказать об этом.
foreign_names.name: Водная Могила
foreign_names.text:
({T}: добавьте {U} или {B}.)
При выходе Водной Могилы на поле битвы вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы этого не делаете, она выходит на поле битвы повернутой.

foreign_names.flavor: 没什么人相信暮篷存在。亲眼见到者更少。而见到后还能报信的，则一个都没有。
foreign_names.name: 积水墓地
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{U}或{B}。）
于积水墓地进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则积水墓地须横置进战场。

foreign_names.flavor: 沒什麼人相信暮篷存在。親眼見到者更少。而見到後還能報信的，則一個都沒有。
foreign_names.name: 積水墓地
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{U}或{B}。）
於積水墓地進戰場時，你可以支付2點生命。如果你未如此作，則積水墓地須橫置進戰場。

name: Watery Grave
original_text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

original_text: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield tapped.

If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

flavor: Cradle of the Golgari's new kingdom. Grave of those who wronged its queen.

foreign_names.flavor: Wiege des neuen Königreichs der Golgari. Grab derer, die der Königin Unrecht getan haben.
foreign_names.name: Überwachsene Grabstätte
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {B} oder {G}.)
Sowie die Überwachsene Grabstätte ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kommt sie getappt ins Spiel.

foreign_names.flavor: Cuna del nuevo reino golgari. Tumba de quienes agraviaron a su reina.
foreign_names.name: Tumba cubierta de hierbas
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Agrega {B} o {G}.)
En cuanto la Tumba cubierta de hierbas entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si no lo haces, entra al campo de batalla girada.

foreign_names.flavor: Berceau du nouveau royaume des Golgari. Tombeau de ceux qui ont fait du tort à sa reine.
foreign_names.name: Tombeau luxuriant
foreign_names.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {G}.)
Au moment où le Tombeau luxuriant arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous ne le faites pas, il arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.

foreign_names.flavor: Culla del nuovo regno dei Golgari, tomba di chi ha offeso la loro regina.
foreign_names.name: Tomba Infestata da Erbacce
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {B} o {G}.)
Mentre la Tomba Infestata da Erbacce entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se non lo fai, entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.

foreign_names.flavor: ゴルガリの新しい王国の揺り籠。その女王に逆らった者の墓場。
foreign_names.name: 草むした墓
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：{B}か{G}を加える。）
草むした墓が戦場に出るに際し、あなたは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。そうしないなら、これはタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreign_names.flavor: 골가리의 새 왕국의 요람. 여왕을 모욕했던 자들의 무덤.
foreign_names.name: 뒤덮인 무덤
foreign_names.text:
({T}: {B} 또는 {G}를 추가한다.)
뒤덮인 무덤이 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 생명 2점을 지불할 수 있다. 그러지 않으면, 뒤덮인 무덤은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

foreign_names.flavor: Berço do novo reino dos Golgari. Túmulo dos que prejudicaram sua rainha.
foreign_names.name: Tumba Abandonada
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Adicione {B} ou {G}.)
Conforme Tumba Abandonada entra no campo de batalha, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se não fizer isso, ela entrará no campo de batalha virada.

foreign_names.flavor: Колыбель нового царства Голгари. Могила для тех, кто причинял зло его царице.
foreign_names.name: Заросшая Гробница
foreign_names.text:
({T}: добавьте {B} или {G}.)
При выходе Заросшей Гробницы на поле битвы вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы этого не делаете, она выходит на поле битвы повернутой.

foreign_names.flavor: 葛加理新王朝的摇篮。迫害其女王者的坟墓。
foreign_names.name: 蔓生墓园
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{B}或{G}。）
于蔓生墓园进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则蔓生墓园须横置进战场。

foreign_names.flavor: 葛加理新王朝的搖籃。迫害其女王者的墳墓。
foreign_names.name: 蔓生墓園
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{B}或{G}。）
於蔓生墓園進戰場時，你可以支付2點生命。如果你未如此作，則蔓生墓園須橫置進戰場。

original_text: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)

flavor: "Our ancestors brought down a Phyrexian portal ship, then built our town on its hull. We're pretty proud of that." —Alene of Riverspan

foreign_names.flavor: „Unsere Ahnen schossen ein phyrexianisches Portalschiff aus der Luft und errichteten auf dessen Überresten unsere Stadt. Darauf sind wir ziemlich stolz." —Alene aus Riverspan
foreign_names.name: Hinterlandhafen
foreign_names.text:
Der Hinterlandhafen kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst einen Wald oder eine Insel.
{T}: Erzeuge {G} oder {U}.

foreign_names.flavor: "Nuestros ancestros abatieron una nave-portal pirexiana y construyeron la ciudad sobre su armazón. Estamos muy orgullosos". —Alene de Puente del Río
foreign_names.name: Puerto interior
foreign_names.text:
El Puerto interior entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que controles un Bosque o una Isla.
{T}: Agrega {G} o {U}.

foreign_names.flavor: « Nos ancêtres ont abattu un navire-portail phyrexian, puis construit notre ville sur sa coque. Nous en sommes très fiers. » —Alene de Couvrefleuve
foreign_names.name: Port de l'arrière-pays
foreign_names.text:
Le Port de l'arrière-pays arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé à moins que vous ne contrôliez une forêt ou une île.
{T} : Ajoutez {G} ou {U}.

foreign_names.flavor: "I nostri antenati abbatterono una nave portale di Phyrexia e sul suo scafo costruirono la nostra città. Ne siamo molto orgogliosi." —Alene di Ponterivo
foreign_names.name: Porto dell'Entroterra
foreign_names.text:
Il Porto dell'Entroterra entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato a meno che tu non controlli una Foresta o un'Isola.
{T}: Aggiungi {G} o {U}.

foreign_names.flavor: 「私たちの先祖はファイレクシアの門船を落とし、その船殻の上に都市を築きました。私たちの誇りです。」 ――リバースパンのアリーン
foreign_names.name: 内陸の湾港
foreign_names.text:
内陸の湾港は、あなたが森か島をコントロールしていないかぎり、タップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{G}か{U}を加える。

foreign_names.flavor: "우리의 선조들은 피렉시아의 관문 함선을 격침시키고, 그 선체에 우리들의 마을을 세웠다. 우리는 그 사실을 자랑스럽게 여기고 있지." —강어귀의 알린
foreign_names.name: 내륙 항구
foreign_names.text:
내륙 항구는 당신이 숲이나 섬을 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {G} 또는 {U}를 추가한다.

foreign_names.flavor: "Nossos ancestrais derrubaram uma nave portal phyrexiana, e depois construíram a nossa cidade no casco dela. Temos muito orgulho disso." — Alene de Transflúvia
foreign_names.name: Porto do Interior
foreign_names.text:
Porto do Interior entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você controle uma Floresta ou uma Ilha.
{T}: Adicione {G} ou {U}.

foreign_names.flavor: «Наши предки сбили фирексийский портальный корабль и построили город на его корпусе. Мы очень этим гордимся». — Алин из Надречья
foreign_names.name: Внутренняя Гавань
foreign_names.text:
Внутренняя Гавань выходит на поле битвы повернутой, если под вашим контролем нет Леса или Острова.
{T}: добавьте {G} или {U}.

foreign_names.flavor: 「我们的先祖曾击落一艘非瑞克西亚境界通道飞船，然后借其舰身建成如今这座城市。我们都以此为荣。」 ～河境城的艾琳
foreign_names.name: 内陆港湾
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控树林或海岛，否则内陆港湾须横置进战场。
{T}：加{G}或{U}。

foreign_names.flavor: 「我們的先祖曾擊落一艘非瑞克西亞境界通道飛船，然後借其艦身建成如今這座城市。我們都以此為榮。」 ～河境城的艾琳
foreign_names.name: 內陸港灣
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控樹林或海島，否則內陸港灣須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{G}或{U}。

original_text:
Hinterland Harbor enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or an Island.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
text:

({T}: {G} 또는 {U}를 추가한다.)
번식의 웅덩이가 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 생명 2점을 지불할 수 있다. 그러지 않으면, 번식의 웅덩이는 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

«Одно начало, много дорог».
— Ваннифар

foreign_names.text:
({T}: добавьте {G} или {U}.)
 При выходе Нерестовой Лужи на поле битвы вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы этого не делаете, она выходит на поле битвы повернутой.

～凡妮法

于滋生之池进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则滋生之池须横置进战场。

～凡妮法

foreign_names.text:

flavor: Farmers cut the trees and buried their dead. The dead rose up and killed the farmers. The trees grew back and strangled the dead.

foreign_names.flavor: Die Bauern fällten die Bäume und begruben ihre Toten. Die Toten standen auf und töteten die Bauern. Die Bäume wuchsen neu und erdrosselten die Toten.
foreign_names.name: Waldfriedhof
foreign_names.text:
Der Waldfriedhof kommt getappt ins Spiel, falls du nicht einen Sumpf oder einen Wald kontrollierst.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {B} oder {G}.

foreign_names.flavor: Los granjeros cortaron los árboles y enterraron a sus muertos. Los muertos se alzaron y mataron a los granjeros. Los árboles volvieron a crecer y ahorcaron a los muertos.
foreign_names.name: Cementerio boscoso
foreign_names.text:
El Cementerio boscoso entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que controles un pantano o un bosque.
{T}: Agrega {B} o {G} a tu reserva de maná.

foreign_names.flavor: Les fermiers coupèrent les arbres et enterrèrent leurs morts. Les morts sortirent de leurs tombes et tuèrent les fermiers. Les arbres poussèrent à nouveau et étranglèrent les morts.
foreign_names.name: Cimetière des sylves
foreign_names.text:
Le Cimetière des sylves arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé à moins que vous ne contrôliez un marais ou une forêt.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {G} à votre réserve.

foreign_names.flavor: I contadini tagliarono gli alberi e seppellirono i loro morti. I morti risorsero e uccisero i contadini. Gli alberi ricrebbero e strangolarono i morti.
foreign_names.name: Cimitero Silvestre
foreign_names.text:
Il Cimitero Silvestre entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato a meno che tu non controlli una Palude o una Foresta.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o {G} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreign_names.flavor: 農夫は木々を切り、死者を埋葬する。 死者は目覚め農夫を殺す。 木々は死者を絡め取り成長する。
foreign_names.name: 森林の墓地
foreign_names.text:
森林の墓地は、あなたが沼か森をコントロールしていないかぎり、タップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{B}か{G}を加える。

foreign_names.flavor: 농부들은 그 나무들을 잘라내 그곳에 죽은 자들을 묻었다. 그 망자들은 무덤에서 일어나 농부들을 도륙했고, 그 나무들은 다시 자라나 망자들을 교살해버렸다.
foreign_names.name: 삼림 묘지
foreign_names.text: 삼림 묘지는 당신이 늪이나 숲을 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.: 나 를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.

foreign_names.flavor: Os fazendeiros cortaram as árvores e enterraram seus mortos. Os mortos se alçaram e mataram os fazendeiros. As árvores cresceram novamente e estrangularam os mortos.
foreign_names.name: Cemitério da Floresta
foreign_names.text:
Cemitério da Floresta entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você controle um Pântano ou uma Floresta.
{T}: Adicione {B} ou {G} à sua reserva de mana.

foreign_names.flavor: Фермеры вырубили деревья и похоронили своих покойников. Покойники вышли из могил и убили фермеров. Деревья снова выросли и удушили покойников.
foreign_names.name: Лесное Кладбище
foreign_names.text:
Лесное Кладбище выходит на поле битвы повернутым, если только под вашим контролем нет Болота или Леса.
{T}: добавьте {B} или {G} в ваше хранилище маны.

foreign_names.flavor: 农民砍掉树木，埋葬逝者。 逝者起身杀死农民； 树长回来将逝者绞死。
foreign_names.name: 林地墓园
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控沼泽或树林，否则林地墓园须横置进战场。
{T}：加{B}或{G}到你的法术力池中。

foreign_names.flavor: 農民砍掉樹木，埋葬逝者。 逝者起身殺死農民； 樹長回來將逝者絞死。
foreign_names.name: 林地墓園
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控沼澤或樹林，否則林地墓園須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{B}或{G}到你的魔法力池中。

name: Woodland Cemetery
original_text:
Woodland Cemetery enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.

foreign_names.text: Neutralisiere einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, es sei denn, sein Beherrscher bezahlt {2}.
